My only frustration now is trying to activate the warranty with the seller. It’s now been a week going back and forth. For spending the extra $50 I’m disappointed so far.

I bought a very similar projector for a very similar price many many years ago.  We used it for a couple years, then the lamp burned out.These have not changed at all in the past 10 years. They project well enough to be seen at night on a large indoor or outdoor screen. They display video in rather poor quality, but it's passable for movie night.They are hard to focus at more than a few feet of distance, and there will always be portions of the screen out of focus.The fan is loud.  That has always been the biggest issue with these cheapo projectors. They are almost unwatchable of you're sitting within 10 feet of the projector.I set mine up behind a shelf so the fan noise is blocked. Highly recommend trying for a solution like that.These are fine for setting up now and then,  but they shouldn't be considered for a main TV or for a movie room in your house.

reviewTitle: Don't let the reviews fool you this is not the one. Buy M03H instead.
reviewDescription: Don't buy this version, because it's very low end. I recommend buying the Auking  M03H projector. M03H is a much better projector and try catching it on a deal. As far as this projector, don't let the reviews fool you this is not the one. Unless you catch it on a deal for less than 50 dollars. I submitted photos of the one I would recommend purchasing.

Great little projector with subpar sound. Was purchasing for movie nights, but will return due to picture quality and sound. Wish I would’ve went with the 15000 L model instead. Will have to wait for that one due to inflation.Update: Due to previous comments on product, seller reached out and sent an external speaker and projector screen to resolve the issues I had previously. Great projector.

I never imagined purchasing a projector for myself and now I can't figure out how I managed to enjoy media without. It started out with me purchasing a TV from a big box store online. I'd never bought and had a TV delivered off a site before. Let's just say things went way awry. Buying this nifty device costed me a fraction of the price and double the enjoyment. With my fire stick in tote, me and my projector go everywhere! The visual quality way surpassed my expectations.  The sound isn't half bad either if you're playing indoors. Simplified menu and device buttons make navigation a synch.  Also great for those with kids! The project can be put away up high and with a screen (or if you have a blank wall) no worries about kiddos pulling TVs down or falling. I'd definitely recommend for those looking for TV media alternatives!

The quality of the projected screen is very crisp and adjustable. Even during the day with closed blinds the image is very bright! The sound system is clear too! The set up was very straightforward and since I have a Samsung phone, I used DeX to choose apps that I wanted to project which was very intuitive. Oh and the tripod I own made it very easy to set it up and project on a desired direction. It can get pretty warm but the ventilator seems up for the job so far! Amazing purchase! 👏
My wife and kids LOVE this thing its 10 out of 10 for me

I have a teeny tiny room and I don’t have any space for a tv so this projector is a life saver!!! I highly suggest buying a Roku Streaming Adapter and it works wonders!! The speakers on the projector is amazing!!!!😍 don’t even hesitate on buying! BUY IT NOW!🫶🏻
Perfect for my Art. Clear and color great
Very nice,I didn't keep it only because I was going to use it for a transfer device to put pictures on a canvas to paint.It didn't get small enough to use it

Love this little projector. Bought it for my bedroom that doesn’t really have room for a tv. Now, it’s like I’m in a movie theater every night. 96” picture and so so clear! The sound is just right for this little room. Well worth the money.
Great product for the price.

Ended up using it in the guest room since I have no TV there, and it works great, even the speakers in it are good enough to watch a movie.I still haven't give it a try outside but inside so far so good and at that low price it is definitely worth to buy.

reviewTitle: No connection included for phones, but works with fire stick
reviewDescription: The projector came fast, packaging is great. However you cannot simply connect your phone through Bluetooth. Screen mirroring wouldn’t come up for me. They have a connection cord on Amazon, if you want to use your phone with this, go to YouTube & search “Auking projector setup” one of the videos will show what cord you need to purchase. The cord is only $12, however it’s lame that it didn’t come with the projector. If I had known that it wouldn’t, I would’ve ordered the cord at the time of this purchase, or just pay more for a Bluetooth projector. It’s good & sturdy, the missing connection is my only issue at this point.Update: works with fire stick. Volume is great, in the video that’s how it sounds turned down most of the way. My 16 month old is obsessed with it. She can watch all of her shows! This video is also at 9:54 AM. Video quality is great.

reviewTitle: No battery/Lens cap if you're expecting them
reviewDescription: No indication that the battery won't be provided for the remote. There was no lens cap in the package despite the manual indicating there would be one. Seems like a lot if missing pieces that should have been indicated causing a bit of frustration.

reviewTitle: For less than a hundred dollars, it’s worth it.
reviewDescription: So overall, I like the unit. However, there’s one small issue. As you can see in the picture, a small bit of light is being projected on the wall. I can live with it until I can afford to get a better projector, it’s just a little annoying.

Thought this would be a good, space saving alternative to a television in my room, however the package arrived, sealed, no damage to box, but missing the remote control and HDMI cable that were listed as included. Returned, getting a TV instead.

reviewTitle: Can't watch movies/shows from Amazon Prime or Netflix
reviewDescription: I purchased this projector to play movies from Netflix and Amazon prime but these services don't allow you to watch them through a projector.  When I tried I got a message that stated it wasn't compatible so I reached out to customer support and they confirmed you can't watch either of these through a projector.  I'm extremely disappointed as that was the main purpose for buying this product.  I read a ton of reviews but didn't see anyone mention this issue so if you are considering a projector for this purpose then reconsider.  This is an issue for all projectors unfortunately, hence the 3 star rating vs a 1... I'm not going to downgrade it completely for an issue all projectors face.  Otherwise, it seemed like it would work fine if only we could watch these sites.
it was fin until my screen starting turning green. I got this two days ago.

cons and pros. pros: audio is amazing! the screen is a pretty good i like it but the cons: i’ve had the projector for a little over a year and it got screen burned, my spotify screen is burnt into the projector so now you can see it whenever i’m using the projector no matter what. it’s distracting and annoying. good for a year maybe 2 if you’re lucky
It works like a charm, does overheat but it does the job and stays on for a long time. I use it quite a lot and it’s not 4K quality but it is great to use with friends.

reviewTitle: Over all not a bad projector
reviewDescription: The projector has a pretty clear picture even though it could be a bit brighter even after adjusting the picture settings. It’s pretty loud but there’s no bass from the internal speak and it’s not Bluetooth which I didn’t think to double check lol. But overall for the price it’s a pretty good mini projector and it gets the job done

This is nice if you just want to watch some shows with a projector. The image quality is not the greatest- you can see the pixels and the edges are waaaay blurry- but if you're just watching a movie outside and don't care if it's Blu Ray quality it works great. Sound is pretty good but you can always hook up a speaker if your want better sound. We just hook up our Chromecast and watch videos from Netflix, Disney+, amazon, etc and have had no problems at all. And we realized our retractable awning makes the perfect screen so outdoor movies are a blast! Some videos won't work with this- I've found that Google play movies won't play or some from a DVD player. But Netflix and Disney+ seem to work.

As most of the reviews say, the brightness is low so the best way to view anything is in the dark, but that's expected. the picture itself for the price isn't my concern, but my major issue is the refresh rate, I'm concerned that I didn't read any reviews on it lagging and mine definitely has refesh rate issues. Children cartoons are nice but if your trying to play a game or watch a love action move, there is short, frequent lag in movement and changing of scenes for some reason. Not sure if it's true 60hz. The remote works as expected, you have to waive it around a bit like Harry Potter.

Purchased this for making videos of teaching lessons for my wife's classes.  It is light weight and has the ability for simple video presentations.  Worked right out of the box with easy setup.  Remote functions as it should without issue.  My only problem is that the brightness of the display from it is not the best and there is no adjustment for dimming or brightening.  It is ok for a small room and a few people but not for medium to large groups.  Very portable and quick to set up.  I use it with a mac computere and hdmi input cable.  Color is good and pretty acurate on the display.  For the price it is good but if it were brighter or adjustable for that area it would be a 5 star unit.
Facil de usar y de transladar
Works great

We were gifted this for Christmas and it is awesome! I would recommend having another set up for sound but it does have some different settings that’s helped make the sound better. Overall in love and excited to use it more!
I’m really enjoying, I do wish however that it would connect to my google chrome cast via hdmi

It's a really good projector. The only negative thing I have to say about it which isn't even that big of an issue as long as ALL LIGHTS ARE OFF is that when it comes to finer details like captions/words or small things in movies/video games or when you pause a movie and all the options come up, most of those are a little fuzzy. You can get the center of the image crystal clear with the focus dial, it's the corners and edges that have the blurry issues. You have to find a balance that makes it a little fuzzy all around but as long as ALL LIGHTS are turned off it's barely noticeable. And if you make the center and one side clear, the other side will be really bad. Both can't be clear with the center being clear too. But the color and brightness is amazing and the sound! The remote doesn't even have to be pointed at the projector which is nice
Looking forward to using this for art projects

We got this to display Atmos window decorations on our front window for Halloween.  It works great when placed in the house and directed at sheer curtains or a frosted shower curtain.  Easy to use with intuitive menu options.  We just loaded some movie files onto a flash drive and selected the correct menu items and it plays the effects on repeat all night long.  Looking forward to also using it for Christmas.

Updated: the company reached out and offered to send me a new updated model for free. I haven’t used it yet but I’m genuinely impressed with how prompt the company was at reaching out and to help. I still don’t recommend this particular model but I would absolutely purchase from the company in the future.I finally used this for a party and it was so disappointing. The picture is awful and the brightness didn’t help. The volume was hardly noticeable. I wish I used it sooner so I could have returned it and got something better for the party.

reviewTitle: So far, looks good! No lens cap, so I made my own!
reviewDescription: I am just getting started with this. I was surprised there was no lens cap included when another reviewer complained about dust. I did find a plastic lid in my kitchen that almost fit. I added a little clear tape to the inside to make it snug. Later I will spray it black and it will look great! But why do I need to do this when this could easily be provided by the manufacturer? A lens cap would add a feeling of protection for the lens and make it seem like a higher quality product. In spite of no lens cap, the device seems bright and clear with a large screen image. I plan to update this review after I view a movie or other images. Hang on...
As expected its fine. Will use this the church events.Will take it to.overseas in my next trip

reviewTitle: ****HOW TO USE WITH IPHONE/IPHONE NOT WORKING FIX!
reviewDescription: All right, I’m writing this review strictly for the people who are buying this to use with their phones. The picture quality is decent, and so is the brightness if your room is dark enough. I didn’t expect the best of the best like how we had at school, but I knew what I was getting into when I decided to buy a budget mini projector. I have no qualms about that, because I knew what I was getting myself into. It’s not a bad projector, by any means.The picture quality is decent, and so is the brightness if your room is dark enough. I didn’t expect the best of the best like how we had at school, but I knew what I was getting into when I decided to buy a budget mini projector. I have no qualms about that, because I knew what I was getting myself into. It’s not a bad projector, by any means. Now, I was about to get very upset at the fact that this projector didn’t work.  there was no mention of how to use it with an iPhone in the booklet that came with it other than to use it with a lightning to HDMI adapter. When plugging the adapter into my phone and the HDMI cord into the projector, no matter what I did and no matter what setting I chose, the picture would not show up. I went through the reviews and saw people having similar issues.Before I rage quit, I decided to check out the reviews for the adapter that I purchased, to see maybe if there was some troubleshooting to be done there. Now, if you’re like me, you want a projector and you want to use it with your phone, but you don’t want to pay upwards of $300 for a big one and you definitely don’t want to pay the $42 price tag that comes with the Apple lightning adapter. I bought a reasonably priced adapter with good reviews hoping that I wouldn’t have any issues. I bought a reasonably priced adapter with good reviews hoping that I wouldn’t have any issues.But alas, it wasn’t working no matter how much i fiddled with it.One simple thing fixed this.take a look at the adapter that you were using in order to get a picture on the projector. Mine Has two ports.. One unidentified port with a symbol that I didn’t recognize, and one for the HDMI cord.If your adapter sounds similar to this (I will try to insert pics when i get back home) plug your iPhone charger into the other port and then plug the charger into the wall. This will charge your phone while also powering the adapter. Then, go to the input menu and select HDMI. As soon as I did this, the picture came on the screen after about 10 seconds.Hope this helped!

It’s really clear great product and price. The only thing that would make it better is a projector screen. Saves you about $500 since you don’t need a tvUpdate. The projector doesn’t last 5 months. It’s horrible now. A big orange spot in the screen and it keeps getting biggerUpdate August 1 : I used my manufacturer warranty and they sent me a new one. Awesome customer service. I am very satisfied.

Was going to return but out of the many projectors I bought this one was the best for the price.Picture quality was better than the others. Unsure as to whether this is native 1080p or what. Skeptical based on price but still pretty decent. However, I did notice it’s start to have black specks and one white one in the corner. Not so bad that it would warrant me to reach out yet so will keep an eye and see.Note: Netflix and most entertainment app has copyright so you can’t sure Bluetooth to stream so it’s pointless to get a project that has that or wifi. Just get a Roku or fire stick. It’ll do everything you need to, even miracast.The remote signal with original remote is strong, it messes with my tv in the next room where if I hit the mute button it turns the tv on lol. Might just be me but thought you should know.Fire stick doesn’t have this company listed as compatible for the remote. Wanted it to really work with the remote so then I could have one main remote and not have to deal with the other sensitivity. However, just gotta deal with both. Still works fine.Tip: use the keystone! I see reviews saying it’s blurring up top or bottom, that’s because you need to balance the picture out. The flatter it is the clearer it’ll be.This is also better in the dark as it’s only 7500 lumen it’s not as great during the day but somewhat not bad when there’s some light.Will update if anything changes.UPDATE: noticed that after getting a shelf and installing it, the corners are blurry like some people mentioned. You can try your best to make it less blurry but I noticed when that happens the middle of the screen becomes blurry. You can’t adjust it without something else being blurry.

I bought this initially cause it was cheaper than a tv and I wanted to be able to play movies from my phone in my bedroom. I bought the lighting cable adapter with it and it would work it with Netflix  but not Disney plus which I think is just apple not allowing things. I ended up just having my pc plugged into it and hdmi and the projector sits on my headboard and works great. I did notice the quality was pretty bad, definitely not 1080 like it claims but I didn’t mind. Also the focusing is pretty horrible as well. It will on focus a section of it and the adjustment only moves that focus point around. I can’t speak on the quality of the speakers since I used Bluetooth speaker for it. The brightness was not the greatest either darker movies were nearly impossible to watch. Other then that it worked as a projector does, it projects. After almost a year (sep2022- aug2023) and mostly daily use, the bulb finally went out on it. I’m debating getting a bulb if I can or just going with a different product. But that’s my almost a year review for y’all. Take from it what you will. Thanks

edit: I have updated my review to 4 stars as the customer service is excellent. They offered to send me a new updated projector that fixes the problems with my first unit.Original Review: I did not expect a top of the line projector at this price point, but I did expect a readable image and some useful features. My unit never came with a remote, so I can't comment on that at all. I have to keep using the buttons on top of the projector to control it, which you have to do each time you turn it on. There is also a very loud intro sound that plays that is terrible at night. I tried a friend's chromecast and the chromecast cannot bypass the intro screen, or the need to hit "hdmi" each time you turn it on. You cannot operate this projector without touching it or without a remote because you have to select 'hdmi' every time.The biggest problem is with the image. The entire screen will not stay in focus unless perfectly square with the wall, even after adjusting the focus and keystone dials. I can get most of the screen in focus but the edges are very bad and hard to read anything that isn't in giant font. I can't stream Netflix or Hulu from my phone because of the copyright limitations, you probably need a chromecast or fire stick to use this device at all. The lens also came with smudges out of the box, and it is very hard to clean everything with the provided Q-tip. Either I have received a defective unit or some quality control has to be done.

reviewTitle: OK for casual viewing, but not for presentations
reviewDescription: This projector would do well for someone interested in causal viewing of moderate resolution video in low light or darkened areas.  Unfortunately, it comes up short projecting text in moderate to well lit environments.  The projected image is not consistently focused over the viewing area, making it less than optimal for things like Powerpoint presentations. Still, at this price, for casual viewing, it's a bargain if you don't expect or require razor sharp images.  You get what you pay for.

I've never owned a projector but I wanted something to watch in the bedroom thats not a TV and I would have to hang on the wall. I don't have enough wall space. This projector is perfect to watch in the ceiling and the sound is loud. Easy to set up. I connected my Chromecast Google dongle and use my Google remote for volume. Works great.Note:The room does have to be dark to have clear picture. There's a manual knob on the projector for adjusting the picture for clarity.The projector remote doesnt come with batteries.In order to select HDMI on the home screen, you have to use projector remote to do so or press the buttons that are located on the projector itself. Which can be a pain if you already positioned your projector somewhere hard to reach.Dust do collect inside the lens. Regular cleaning will need to done.Other than that, its a simple piece of equipment for transport, set up, and serves my purpose.Connect some awesome speakers and you'll have a theater experience on your home ceiling.

reviewTitle: The Auking Project used with HDMI connected to a PC and an XBOX
reviewDescription: This is a very small projector that I purchased for the price, average review, and review count.I have mostly used this projector in my living room and with a Dell laptop, I was able to connect easily using an HDMI cable. I connected a DVD player via USB and due to the distance from the wall (11 feet from the front of the projector to the wall) I was seeing a stunning 9 foot (along the diagonal) image. I watched Minority Report which was such a darker film that I need to increase the brightness. I also watched the Sound Of Music and was able to see details in the mansion and at the abbey I had missed on a 42 inch TV, which is 3.5 times smaller than the 9 foot projected image I was setup for. My living room only has one vacant wall, so I couldn't test closer to the published limit of 170 inches.DVD's were SD so I connected the projector to my XBOX which outputs  in HD1080p. I played No Man's Sky, which looked incredible. I also watched Old Guard with my wife and Minority Report (again) with my son. Both appreciated the larger picture and quality. My wife said during dark scenes she saw a little graininess, but felt it added to the experience and made the picture look "old school".I wasn't able to connect with my phone yet.I have used this in a classroom near windows that had no shades, which wasn't great but did the job even for students 18 feet away from the screen. It was a similar setup that I used with HDMI connected to my Dell laptop HDMI.  Due to COVID restrictions, desk spacing, and outlet placement, I was not able to try to get the picture to be as large as it was in my living room.I will also add that I used the output 1/8 inch jack connected to a small Roland speaker I own. The sound is impressive.While connected via a laptop using HDMI and playing YouTube videos, however, the sound is very harsh. I needed to turn down the low end to nothing to attenuate the bass, but nothing I did could prevent the low buzz and gurgle I was hearing. This is harsh audio is non-existent using HDMI with the Xbox and using HDMI with a laptop.

This is a great little projector for outside movie nights. I wish there was a way, and i’m sure there is but i’m not tech savvy, to connect a speaker to it. The speaker it comes with is pretty poor, though not terrible if you’re close enough.
Love the projector

I bought this projector less than a year ago. The quality is great- it was what I expected based on the description. All of a sudden it started to randomly shut off sometimes 3 minutes after on and sometimes 20 minutes until it would not turn on at all. I wrote the company and they quickly responded within the same evening and attempted to problem solve with me. They ended up shipping me a replacement that I received the same week. Amazing customer service. Highly recommend purchasing from AuKing to friends and family. I will purchase from this company again- I can trust they will be fair and honor their product warranty with a speedy response. I felt compelled to share my experience.

I’m a mural artist and on occasion need a projector to transfer text or logos to a wall. I’ve used an overhead dinosaur for years but decided to give this economical little projector a try as it’s a lot smaller and I can connect to my phone (with and adapter not included.) I haven’t used it on a job yet, but tested it on a wall at home and was impressed with its brightness in daylight and the sharp focus. Excited to try on job site soon.

Very happy with it so far! And was super easy to set up and use! Definitely would recommend it to friends and would buy another for every room if everyone wanted one! So many different possibilities for its use! I’m excited and I’ve named mine “The Game Changer!” LoL ☺️. Thank you!!!

reviewTitle: Doesn't work with Google Pixel 6 - works with Chromecast
reviewDescription: Update:The company contacted me and we chatted back and forth - they're really responsive! Odd they don't have a website and their email address is AuKingDirect@outlook.com, but they were quick to respond, replace the unit, and overall aim to make sure the customer is happy so I changed my rating from 3 stars to 5 because of how well the experience was with them and that the product is good sans the fact that it's not clear that it doesn't work with more modern phones. The device might not work with more current phones but it works well with a chromecast and is overall a good product. Chromecast or devices similar to a chromecast are not too expensive to purchase and can be utilized with other products so it's not a bad cost to buy one along with the discounted price of this projector.------------------------------ORIGINAL Review:Their list of phones doesn't mention the Google Pixel in general so that should have been the clue but they responded to a few people in the Questions section asking if this would work with their google pixel, they just need an HDMI adapter so I took the chance and it didn't work out :( I bought two different kinds of adapters and the HDMI port kept saying that there was no signal so I ended up returning it. That said, I gave it three stars because the product itself is nice and overall had a nice screen and such for the price, just a shame it doesn't work with newer phones given that it's listed as a 2022 upgraded version.

For years, I had used a bulky Epson projector that only attached to my PC or ipad with special connectors.This Auking projector is about 1/4 the size, does the same size images, and has multiple ports including HDMI that I can connect to my PC or even easier, with an adaptor, to my iphone.  Plus the Auking cost about $65 while my Epson was over $300.  Only thing I haven't added is bluetooth connector.  That is next.

reviewTitle: Works great and there support team is great to

reviewDescription: This is a versatile tool great for Art or quick demos
Super nice easy to set up love it!!!

reviewTitle: Pretty sure I was sent a refurbished and non working item.
reviewDescription: Does not focus worth anything, blurry no matter how far away from screen or focus setting is set at. As in so blurry you can KIND of make out the picture if you know what its suppose to be.Lense had a scratch on it and what looked like a thumbprint on the inside. Sticker on bottom; with what im guessing was a serial number; is worn off... Also you can see faint rings around bottom mounting screw, as if it was previously mounted. So....HEAVY testing before sending out...or refurbished item. Not cool.Its not even heavy enough to use as a doorstop if I wanted! Totally useless as is.Will look into troubleshooting more tomorrow. But as of tonight? Totally and utterly garbage. Will return if no better luck troubleshooting tomorrow.***edit/update***Got the replacement today. It confirmed my thoughts about first one being used. Not dirty at all, has packing the other one was missing, and also has additional instructions that were not in the first one.HOWEVER!!!! It also had used twisty ties and other packing stuff UNDER the 'new' projector. Used/Returned item sent to me again!!!!!Seller is NOT selling new. Paid for new, not returned or open box. This projector works, but im sending it back due to the reason of paying for new and getting used.NOT buying from seller again. Looking elsewhere.***NEW UPDATE!!!!!***Gotta agree with people who say customer service is the true gem here. Not gonna say what all happened, but will say they did me right in the end!!!!

There's a lot of screen tearing and it does not seem like it uses a 60hz panel. I wasn't expecting something perfect for this price which is why I give it 3 stars. after a few hours of use i can conclude playing games is kind of tough with how jittery the picture can be and it isn't too bad if you are just watching videos I recommend shopping around a bit before choosing this one.

If you don't care too much about picture quality then this projector is okay.  The sound was pretty good but the picture was grainy.  I felt like I was watching an old kung fu movie.  Better to spend more and get HD quality picture.

reviewTitle: it’s okay for what you paid
reviewDescription: It’s decent quality but not the best, but i guess it is worth what you pay for. If you’re getting to watch movies on with a laptop, i suggest you stick to just watching it on there. But if you’re using it for movies with a group of friends then yes it’s pretty good. Also the audio can get horrible at times. You’ll hear a static like sound and sometimes it’s louder than the actual audio. As for gaming, i wouldn’t consider it.
Bootup video is annoying and a waste of space.no serial... if they could figure out how to make this with an open android system it would be amazing.

Baught mainly because I wanted a projector for artwork projects but also have the perfect set up space to utilized for movies. Am unfortunately returning because fan noise is impossible to ignore even over audio. Speakers on unit are also not pleasant to listen to, opted to listen through laptop instead. (Ended up watching on laptop to, just better ) Picture is not great for movies, but it is quite good enough for art. If you are serious about your movie/show nights opt for something else. Would be perfect for kids.

Only tried it out briefly but.. Pros: Nice little projector.. lightweight easy to use.. quiet fan and exhaust is not hot..  Cons: picture quality can use some improvement and remote only seems to work when extremely close to the unit which defeats the purpose of a remote..Otherwise great bang for d buck.. I have 2 full size ones and I feel like I was robbed.. 5-6 times the price for similar or only slightly better quality. Would buy again if it proves to give good output over time.

For the price, I cant really complain about it being dim in most scenarios but the lens came loose within the first 2 months causing light leakage from the sides of the lens (projection being somewhere it's not supposed to be). HDMI came a little bent then broke in a month. Otherwise 1080p COMPATIBLE isnt all that bad compared to an actual HD projector. Would highly consider exactly why you want or need this product. Great for hd capable movies on any white surface and PowerPoint presentations.
Nose ve tan nítido como creí. Esta bien por 80$ pero si quieres algo más nítido "no es esta la opción"
Love it ! We have a issue first time using,  thought a bug was on screen but their is a black spot in the screen that must come from lense or within.  😞 Alittle annoying at times.

reviewTitle: You get what you pay for
reviewDescription: Bought it for a kid down the street after the first and breaking he received a second one and it was broken as well. The first one broke possibly do two thermal shock or maybe a drop I don’t know. Just letting you know you get what you pay forYou get what you pay for. Had this been mounted in a room and not moved around a lot so maybe the first one would have Beenand just fine, who knows?
Doesn’t perform well in business environment.

reviewTitle: The cheaper projector you have to buy additional cords for it to even work !!
reviewDescription: Got 3 projectors for my children for Easter . Open 2 up and they need some cord that I have to go buy for it to even work . I can’t rate the picture and sound or how it works . Just wanted to advise those when you spend 70 dollars on this projector it will cost just as much as the projector with Bluetooth . Save your money !

******Update:Would not buy again. This won’t stream Netflix with sound from my phone due to copyright laws. Also, it won’t stay connected to my iPhone, and after it boots me off it shares a “phone link” screen that has a QR code for an app. Upon downloading, my phone began make a screeching sound and I had to unplug it. So that’s awesome.I suppose I could get a Firestick for no other reason than to use this projector or drag a DVD player outside at this point and hook it up. Maybe VHS. Watch Mrs. Doubtfire or something. Idk. It’s a good movie.We initially used it to watch home videos and that’s about all we can do. ******We’re using it on a screen attached to our pergola and the kids LOVE outdoor movie nights.It’s a great way to have friends over while staying outdoors.Pros- clear and bright picture quality- small and easy to take on trips/visitsCons- not even a con, but the focus dial did not turn when I first tried to adjust; if you run into this, simply turn the lens edge instead, which then moves the focus dial and accomplishes the same thing

The projector will not stay turned on long enough to do the initial setup.  After multiple attempts of unplugging and plugging back in as directed through troubleshooting it still does not work. Tried to reach company via the email listed for customer service, the contact us drop down is not in English therefore I can’t leave information to be contacted about issue.

reviewTitle: This projector requires an attachment if your wish is to use your phone or Ipad air
reviewDescription: Solid little projector that does not come with phone attachment cord. Part at Staple's was $69.00 Canadian . On Amazon part is $21.00 US . Once I got the phone attachment part and hooked it up I was unable to open up any files from my phone / photo's to use for my art from the projector. I watched the video's for hookup but found them confusing, so good news Amazon has a great return policy within 30 days that I tapped into.
Never could get this to connect, tried everything they say to do, never worked. Super disappointing. And the instructions were not helpful.
No funciona tratas y tratas de conectar pero no funciona nunca puedes arrancar este aparato pérdida de dinero.Y no te regresan al dinero te dan un crédito aquí en Amazon

DONT BOTHER- MISLEADING PIECE OF JUNK!!!! Purchased this for backyard entertainment instead of using my flat screen. Received it just yesterday 6/14/20. Have been trying to get it to work with any devices possible for the last 1 1/2 hours-have gotten nowhere.The instructions/manual are so vague and not helpful. Does NOT plug and play any devices listed as stated in the description. All devices connected receive "NO SIGNAL". Despite the description here on Amazon.  The manual page 1 section 4.1 states "USB PORT DOES NOT SUPPORT PHONE CONNECTION".I tried every device in my home, desktop computer and laptop with the vga port, usb with my phone and tablet, the hdmi port with my smart tv, and the mico sd slot. None of these ports work. Not a true "plug and play" device. Not to mention you need to be 1 inch from the projector for the remote to even be recognized or you get no response.  Stay away from this product. You will waste your precious time and get nowhere with it. This will be packed up today and returned for a refund.  Its a shame because the casting picture is not too bad, but cant get anywhere past the main menu. Not worth the $89.99....its just a big flashlight

reviewTitle: good at first but won’t last
reviewDescription: it’s alright but not worth it.. i use it most nites to watch anime and it lasted less than a year without problems.get one with bluetooth because the aux cord stopped working and sound quality is mid without a speaker.there’s not enough lumens for daylight watchingi bought it april 2023 and january 2024 is when problems began.BUY A HIGH QUALITY PROJECTOR WITH ENOUGH LUMENS AND BLUETOOTH IF YOU ARE PLANNING ON DAILY USAGE!!!

The instructions don’t even seem to be for the version sent the way they ask to connect to the internet from my device the projector doesn’t even have the option to do, I can’t get my phone to connect, and only after it’s delivered does the damn manufacturer mention that exactly none of my streaming services can be played on the projector from my phone. What the hell was the point of this product I can’t use??

reviewTitle: Good for the money, worked as expected
reviewDescription: It’s a good little projector. You can’t beat it for the price. The picture quality is good when the projector is close, and the image is small around 50-75 inches. At 120 inches, I’d say that My visual experience closer to 480p.That’s still not horrible if you try to remember that you didn’t pay very much for it. The Light strength is lower-midrange. Like any projector, it’s best when the sun is down.All in all, a good little machine. I wouldn’t recommend as a primary TV source because of the picture quality at large screen lengths and the light quality during daylight hours. It is a good little machine for movie nights and sports games.
The projector is a great value and works great for most viewing, however, when pushed back for the widest view it does not project adequate light.
Great picture and great sound but it did not come with a remote and when I tried to get a hold of customer service they never replied

I was super excited about this projector but turns out it won’t play Netflix or Hulu due to copyright so if you got it to project the you know major streaming services do not buy. Otherwise seemed like it would have been great!

We purchased this projector for our daughter’s birthday party, and it 100 times better than the $300 projector in our movie room.Update 12/3/2020 downgraded from 5 stars to 3.Now that I have used it a few times I have noticed that the fan is very loud and makes a buzzing type noise when you start it up. I have to turn the system on and off several time to get it to stop. I ordered a replacement  and we will see if it does the same thing.
It is what it is. You get what you paid for. The brightness and picture quality is not great.

ProsSet up was easy for operating from my computer with VGA.Seems like a solid unit and remote worked fine.Easy to operatePrice is goodConsNot nearly bright enough unless in total darkness and clarity not as good as my old epson projector.More a childs toy than a real usable projector.I guess that is why it is so reasonably priced.
Did not realize i needed an external dvd drive

reviewTitle: common onboard built in speaker or external sound cuts out sometimes
reviewDescription: Some devices sound cuts off, others are fine, also if on too long about 24hrs as a normal tv would be again itll lose sound i was worried at first it broke but nope its the very first thing in the trouble shoot list.. i guess its a common thing idk if its with all projectors or few or just this one. kinda wish it was quote portable aka battery operated and brighter for daylight muals on buildings. all n all im happy with my Auking and all the kool things im gunna do with it

reviewTitle: I guess it is good enough
reviewDescription: I have used this to watch a some UTUBE videos and the picture seemed ok. I bought to use for gaming but not sure the extent of light in the room will make it worthwhile. I will keep it for those movie nights and camping but will look elsewhere for the gaming aspect.

We bought this to take overseas for our daughter's wedding in Italy. It worked perfectly, the brightness was good for the outside dinner and reception, and so far, that's all I have used it for, but movie time on the new deck is in our future. Recommended.

reviewTitle: A bit dim but good customer support
reviewDescription: After trying this projector and being disappointed in the overall performance, AuKing reached out and sent a slightly upgraded unit that better fit my needs.This project, projects, but it's a bit dim.  Other than that though, it is dead simple to use, and has SURPRISINGLY good speakers for watching films.  For the price, it is worth it, just make sure the room is dar.

Overall it’s a great projector for the price and what I use it for. I just wanted something to display movies on in my bedroom without having a tv, which is great. I connected my Apple TV and it works perfectly. Only issue is that Netflix doesn’t have any sound on it but I’m pretty sure that’s because of Netflix/Apple TV and not because of the projector but that is something to consider. I have bought an hdmi adaptor in order to see if that will fix it and I will update if that fixes the sound issue. Other than that Hulu, Amazon Video, and YouTube all work with sound. The projector does make a whirring noise when powered on but it’s easy to drown out with the higher volumed shows. The remote is a little cheap feeling and doesn’t always work. Picture quality is fairly good but it does need to be pretty dark to get a good clear picture. All in all it’s a good product for the price.
Box was damaged but the projector 📽️ was fine.Imagine showed how the YouTube played. Other videos was much clear.

reviewTitle: Low priced projector is built in good quality  It shuold not be ignored because of the price
reviewDescription: This is 70 dollar projector it is not fair to compare this to high end projector.But this small projector provides vivid color and good contrast even in dark movie scene.I tried this on my apt glossy wall.and wall blind.I conclude that all projector user must have professional screen.I am sure that viewer will get much better quality.Actually this projector is little dark but I am sure that the dedicate screen will reflect more light which will improve bright level upThere is one design flaw but it can be fixed (Referring to attached pictures)Projector light comes out through intake vent hole on back of projector.If projector is placed in front of view it bothers for viewer's eyes.But If you put 90 degree angle paper on the projector it will block the beam of light.Luckily vent hole is intake so a little gap (about  0.3 inch) is enoughBut when you put the paper you must be careful not to cover IR sensor next to vent hole
Works as expected.

reviewTitle: Did not received manual in box.  Trying to get manual. Have not used projector yet.
reviewDescription: I bought this for art projects.  The box lists items in box, but the manual is missing.  There is no address on box.  We will see if I can get it hooked up.  Needs an adapter which I ordered (another $20), and it should come today.I hesitated buying in the first place because I am the opposite from “techie”!  So, when the manual was not put in the box I was very disappointed.

Me gustó mucho por su imagen, tamaño y rapidez en la entrega además llegó bien ampacado recomiendo ampliamente al vendedor.Se ve bien en la pared compraré el telón y sé q su imagen mejorará notablemente.
Bought this in January and it stopped working yesterdayUpdate the seller realized that i had a old model and was very helpful in getting me a new model and so far all has been well

Pretty good projector at the price paid- I would like to hope most people would temper their expectations since this is not meant to be a top of the line projector.  But once it was up and running, it’s a cool and unique way to enjoy movies and shows on a larger screen. Setting up with the phone was cumbersome but with a MacBook it was fairly simple. Using the sound from your MacBook is sufficient for the experience as well. If you just want an affordable projector to have some occasional fun, this is a good buy.
It has worked great so far! No issues. The project is perfect for a bedroom.
beyond upgrade from our $20-30$ projector, totally worth the investment! happy we got this product on prime day!
Working great with my iPhone but I needed to buy some cable for connecting. It has built in speaker. It’s doing it’s thing 😁

Got this for our guest room thinking it would be fun to lie in bed and watch movies, or have something fun for people staying over. We didn't expect much from this at all, and have been shockingly surprised overall. I have it set up about 5 or 6 feet from a blank off white colored wall and it projects to somewhere around 7' by 5'. It projects pretty big, but you can obviously move it closer or further if you need more or less space.Pros:1. This speaker exceeds expectations, it so much fun to watch movies/tv shows on, and is something fun for ourselves and the occasional guest who stays over.2. It's small and compact, it easily stores away quickly and easily in a small nightstand drawer when not in use.3. Has good options for input/output. You can plug in an external hard drive or USB flash drive with preloaded movies, you can plug in a HDMI input for gaming systems, Chromecast, firestick whatever to stream, and it has aux outputs in case you want to use different speakers.4. It projects to a large surface and the picture quality is awesome for what it is. You're not getting the best picture quality, but if you're watching more classic movies, or movies that are cool to watch on a bigger screen (think Jurassic park, LoTR, gritty crime movies, Ozarks, super hero movies), this is awesome.5. It only needs to be plugged into one outlet (2 if you're using something like a chrome cast) so it's easy to bring outside and watch stuff on the side of the house or bring to a friends house or vacation for movie nights on the go.Cons:1. The projector itself doesn't have the greatest speakers (though they made up for this in my opinion with the option to hook up external speakers if you want).2. The fan in the unit can be noticeable if the sound is low. Honestly though I sit like 2 feet from, it when I watch movies so if you set it up a little further away or just turn the volume up, you won't notice it 90% of the time.Overall: Definitely worth it, great picture quality for the price and what it is, lots of input/output ports so there's a lot of uses for it. I'd say that if you're on the fence, but it. I gave it 5 stars due to how well it exceeded expectations.
The picture quality is better than expected, but the sound quality needs extra speakers.

if you want the best customer service this is the company to buy from ! the first projector must have been dropped because the screen was all out of wack . this projector was replaced very fast after contacting auking .the projector is connected to a 2017 hp bs15-062st laptop set at 1920x1080 60 hertz and a Facmogu F900S mini amp with 4 polk audio rm6801 speakers .the video don't not come close to how incredible the picture from the projector it really is . the screen is just a $10 photographer back drop cut to 70x40 inch's with the projector 7 and a half feet away , so with a real projector screen it would be 100x better . I've had many sub $100 projectors and this one is the best that i can find .
Great buy

This little projector is a great value! For its size and price it can make a big picture that’s pretty clear from a reasonable distance. The room does need to be darker so windows need to be covered. But I could not expected such great value for the price! 10/10 would recommend for someone looking for an occasional projector for family movie night or events.

This thing is AMAZING! I was on the fence, I had never bought a projector before, and was “dumb” to what I needed to buy. After looking to it I bought this one! And it’s worth the money!! Clear pictures. My screen is 16ft?  The sound was kinda quiet but I still love it!
Meet the expectations

reviewTitle: Works great as a living room tv
reviewDescription: I purchased this for my apartment because I needed a tv for my living room and it works great. I was nervous about it being a lot cheaper than the other ones but It’s perfect and I’m glad I got it. Customer service is also amazing, my dog has chewed the remote multiple times and they are kind enough to replace it for free. I would recommend using a screen to make it brighter if you’re not projecting on a reflective white surface (same with any projector)

I bought this for my son as a Christmas gift. It is AWESOME and we use it for family night often because we all want to enjoy it. My only regret is not getting the Bluetooth option to connect our speaker wirelessly. My first world problem was the pain of looking for an aux cable at home so we could immediately connect our external speaker LoL

reviewTitle: Horrible pixelated image and color fluctuations. UPDATED REVIEW
reviewDescription: I purchased this after reading the mixed reviews and took a chance.  Just unboxed it and tried it with 2 different HDMI cables from both laptop and desktop.  Horrible quality, just a joke.  I needed this to replace my artograph projector to transfer images for paintings and drawings. As they say buyer beware.  Returning it today.UPDATE  8-4-2022>. After returning the device, I was contacted by AuKingDirect customer service to apologize for me getting an obviously defective device and asked for another chance to earn my trust and business.  I then received the upgraded 1080P version designed more for artists, but also with the same features for digital playback as a movie projector if desired.  HUGE difference right out of the package.  Plugged in, super clear and the interface works perfect for me.  I appreciate the multiple emails and contact from their customer service agent to make sure that this latest delivery went smoothly and I was happy with their product.  Many thanks!  Because of their extra effort after the sale, I have amended the original one star review.  Any company can have a defective device and it was my turn I guess, but this one works awesome!
Ease of use and portability
After several attempts to connect to inferior projectors, this one finally delivered on its ability to connect smoothly. So far, so good and the ease of use is a plus.

reviewTitle: EDIT FROM 1 to 5 stars, and well deserved!!
reviewDescription: NEW REVIEW: So when I finally posted my review, the company reached out to me and it turns out mine may have been defective. The seller went out of their way to make sure I had a fully functioning projector, including using the correct adapter. Our replacement one works just as it should and they went above and beyond to make sure it was working as it should.This is how customer service and companies should operate. Absolutely amazing customer service which I did not expect, and was incredibly impressive.I would not hesitate to buy form this seller again. They stand but their products and will make it right. It makes purchasing from them an easy decision.And our new projector works as it should which we very much appreciate.ORIGINAL POST: I have tried every adapter I can and still this thing will not connect to my iPhone. It’s a complete waste of money. And because I thought it was something I was doing wrong, I didn’t return it in time to get a refund. Such a colossal waste of my money and my time.

I have worked with dozens of professional projectors from Eiki, Panasonic, Sony, Christie, Sharp, Sanyo, Barco, and Barco.  This little AuKing is not in the same league as professional grade projectors that cost more than 20 times as much.  But for the price, this thing is awesome.  It helps to make sure that the projector is centered with your screen (horizontally and vertically) to make sure that the whole image is in focus. The picture is good, the features are good, and the sound is OK.  It mounts to a tripod and weighs next to nothing.  For the price, I wouldn't have expected this high of quality.

reviewTitle: Good product, clear image, easy to set up
reviewDescription: I bought this to present at a conference. It arrived quickly and in good condition. It was easy to set up and use. It was also easy to carry around the conference until my presentation (the box was small, secure, and had a handle). It has a clear image that shows color well. I am glad I bought this and look forward to having it for future conferences/ presentations.I used it on my laptop and the remote doesn't connect to changing slides so if you use it for a presentation, you still need someone or something to click through slides.
What a terrific projector.  Certainly not the brightest, but it is small and easy to use.  Has all the connectors  needed for phone, laptop, anything.  And it works great.

reviewTitle: great choice for my kids and family
reviewDescription: I have an expensive camera and the kids often want to see pictures and video. I did not want them to destroy it. (Computer only at work so I was looking for a way to show them the contents of the camera without destroying it)I found a great solution - after many searches I found !!Wow I was really excited about this projector!Menu just like I was looking for - no pictures and junk just nice icons.Easy to use interface -Reads most video, voice and image formats.The only downside I think - you need a special memory card for the projector with an NFTS file system because then the amount of memory of the photos and video up to 2T and then you will see all the files.The problem is that the camera will not read it ... so it's good to have a special memory card for the projector.The projector has a presentation of the images you selectHigh quality of viewingHigh and very clear soundNot noisyVideo and image viewing functionsAnd most importantly - nice customer service that gives a technical answer and fast service to every questionI think I made a great choice that I purchased this projector for my kids and family.
Received this projector today and was working fine. It started to glitch and will be returning product.

This is the 2nd projector less than $100 that I've tried. My goal was to project some fireworks since 4th of July was cancelled.Sadly, this was rather disappointing. Fireworks would launch a circle-ish shape and then explode into cubes. It looked like I was projecting from a color Gameboy or something. I checked all the settings and "1080p" was selected etc. There is no darn way this is 1080—its barely half that, and that's probably too generous.The lens doesn't come with a cover and the brightness is terrible. There is no bag or case either.I returned it and after hours of research, finally went with a "1080p native" that cost about $220. I don't think a decent projector in this price range exists unfortunately. The native part is important as this one claims "1080p emulated" — whatever the heck that means.

Was working well for about 2 week and then started to randomly turn off on its own and now won't turn back on. When it was working it was good. The room must be dark for a good picture but that is expected for a projector at this price. Returning it since it quit work and just going to spend $500 to $1,000 on a projector that will work in a brighter room so I don't need it to be really dark all the time.
It has a dark spot in the top corner after 3 months. It sucks

Product arrived on time and the box looked new when I opened it up it was covered in dirt spots and every opening was filled with thick sticky dust. There’s also small smudges along all of it including the lens. I have no idea how it got to be in this condition but it’s definitely not new like I purchased.

Wanted to really like this projector, and I'm not really peaky, but wanted a second projector as back up and this projector was not bright enough to enjoy. Add the view of heavy pixels on the screen and it calls for a poor picture. I had gone of some super clear pictures posted in the reviews, but the real deal was nowhere even close to the pictures' quality. Returned and refunded.

reviewTitle: Netflix and other apps like peacock and Hulu do not work
reviewDescription: I was excited to try it especially for to watch the World Cup on it unfortunately peacock doesn’t work I tried Netflix and Hulu and it doesn’t work either only thing that works is YouTube. I reached out a couple days ago and haven’t received anything. Most likely going to return it if I don’t hear back
The projected image not as sharp as showing. Bought screen to test still no sharp image.

reviewTitle: Adequate but picture is not crisp
reviewDescription: Maybe this is okay for some applications, but the picture quality is pretty awful. If you don't care about having a good quality image, it's fine. But details get blurred out, and attempts to use the focus control can improve it but it's still very much lacking. Probably worth the price tho. Can't beat that.

reviewTitle: Could never figure out how to use it.
reviewDescription: It sits in a box and I bought a large flat screen TV, something I was hoping to avoid. This device does not produce a bright enough or sharp enough image for movie watching.
Couldn't fully experience this product because it kept over heating in under 3 mins so the projection would turn off

reviewTitle: Lines throughout display after a couple months.
reviewDescription: I purchased this projector on 11/1 it was really good for the first 2 months…however yesterday 12/30 the display was messed up. I turned it on & off but it stayed that way. I can’t return it because Amazon says the 30 days was up. There’s nothing I can do. I wish I had purchased a different one. For the price & it to only work for 2 months.

reviewTitle: They sent a used, damaged unit
reviewDescription: I purchased a new unit, what I received was a used projector. There is wear and adhesive around the mounting screw hole where it had been previously fixed to a mount (not included). Worst of all, THERE'S A LARGE OCCLUSION NEARLY CENTER SCREEN that I assume is a notch on the interior lens; the focusing lens is clean and clear. I can't get to it to be sure because it's inside the housing, but if it's dirt it's stuck on too tight to dislodge, and it looks more like a nick in the glass. I'm guessing that's why whoever owned it first returned it.

I wish I knew the HDMI cable was not included as now I’m unable to use the projector. The box it comes in says there is an HDMI cord included so I’m not sure why this was taken out of the packaging. Not happy with this purchase.

I really enjoyed this projector in the beginning but about two weeks after setting it up it got this weird line near the bottom that messes with the picture and never goes away. It jitters on the screen too so it’s really distracting. Sad because I really loved everything else about the projector :/

I saw this projector and thought for the price you couldn’t go wrong! Save your money and purchase a better quality projector. Mine will restart for whatever reason, the remote will work when it wants too, brightness isn’t the best but the biggest issue I’m having is trying to get the picture to focus. I have tried adjusting it as much as I can but it’s never all focused at once sadly.

Bright but the pixilation is the clearest part. On my 80” screen they stood out and hurt my eyes. Better shell out a few more bucks for one of the hundreds of other models out there. This ones unwatchable.-New update as of 4-8-22Auking also seems to have the WEWATCH brand under their umbrella.I was able to get my hands on the V53 model.WOW, now we are talking. This is a very impressive, cost efficient projector. No need to kill all the lights. On my 100” screen the image was very bright, crystal clear, no blurring anywhere, pixels were nonexistent, and the color rendering was spot on. I give the WEWATCH V53 2 thumbs up. I’ve tried 6 different brands/models of projectors ranging from $90.00-$250.00I’m done trying. This is the winner.

Don’t spend your money on this product. The projector stopped working and messed with images on the computer screen. Quality was not worth it for the price. Attempted to contact support to see if fixing it was some kind of solution but received no support. Spend your money elsewhere

reviewTitle: Took it a part and now I can’t get it back together
reviewDescription: A dark spot grew on the projector until I couldn’t take it any more. Took it a part and Amazon and the manufacturer can’t help me. My fault for buying a cheap projector smh, waste of money

reviewTitle: Buyer beware, very dim, and doesnt work with most devices
reviewDescription: I setup the projector in a very dark basement and the screen was still very dim.  It is not bright at all, nor does it have vibrant colors. First I tried it with a smart phone and it would not recognize the device. Then I tried it with a dvd player, which connected to projector, but screen was completely jumbled. Sound worked fine. We were never able to get screen to come in clearly with dvd player. Lastly, I hooked it up to my laptop and it did work. Picture was not good, but it did work. This has been the biggest failure of anything I have ever bought from Amazon. I cannot understand the great reviews??? It is a terrible product. I am afraid to buy another projector from Amazon. I think I will stick with Best Buy for electronics.

[UPDATE December 2021]: In response to my review, AuKing updated the menu options and kindly sent me a new projector to test. I confirmed the menu updates eliminate all guesswork as to what repeat mode you are on. The options now read "R1" or "R ALL" so there is no more guessing. I now consider this a great projector to use for AtmosFX projections, and the customer service was fantastic.Original Review:I bought this projector specifically to loop AtmosFX videos for Halloween. I got it working by adding digital videos to a TF/microSD card. HOWEVER, the menu makes it impossible to know which repeat mode you're on. (see pic)It's maddening to drop 10+ videos in a folder, select them all to play (and you can't control the order, no matter how you name them), then leave thinking you got the repeat mode set correctly...only to come back later and find the drive menu is showing to the whole neighborhood (see other pic).To test, I selected only 2 videos and sat there babysitting it to make sure it was looping correctly - which still failed a few times, because I'm not sure it's registering each time I select "Repe.." with the remote. Sometimes I click once, sometimes 2-3 times - I'm never sure what works. I thought I figured it out, selected all my videos again, clicked Play, set the repeat, left for a few minutes...and came back to see the menu up on the screen again.I wanted to like this projector but the repeat function is driving me insane. The UI is weak - there is NO indication what repeat mode is selected. I'm considering editing videos together to make one big file that plays for 3 hours instead of relying on the loop function.

I've had this product for about a year and a half and have gotten a lot of enjoyment out of it. I like not having a TV and being able to completely and easily store this projector when I'm not using it. I haven't been able to get the USB to work with a DVD player, but it connects to my laptop via HDMI cable and I use a Google Home device with my cell phone.  You do need black out blinds for a good viewing experience as it is difficult to see if the room is brightly lit.Recently, the projector stopped turning on for no apparent reason. I reached out to the company and they are sending me a new one even though the warranty period has passed. Honestly it was so odd that I suspected a scam! I await my new projector, it seems too good to be true....

reviewTitle: Great Value & Bang for your Buck! Order!!!
reviewDescription: I recently moved to a new place with my children. I previously got rid of all our TVs from the old home, and wanted a fresh start.I looked for a decently priced projector for my kids room, and I read through all reviews first. This was rated very highly and I could not try it out sooner.It's exactly what we needed! Has a lot of features. We plugged in our Amazon Fire TV stick and bam. Their bedroom wall is like their own personal movie theatre.Cannot recommend this one enough. We did after exactly a month have a glitch on the screen for probably 5-10 mins. It went away on its own. Might have been caused by my kids leaving this on, and it gets warm.Really happy with this purchase. I plan to get one for the living room and my own room!

I was on vacation a few weeks ago and decided to buy a Firestick Lite to use in the hotel TV. I don't own a TV at home. I mostly just use my laptop or my tablet for streaming shows. I enjoyed using the Firestick so I decided to buy this projector just for that and mount it in my bedroom. I'm pretty pleased with the projector's performance. In my room it's sitting about 12ft away from the wall so the projection is about 120". That's a little more than 8.5x5 feet. Up close i can see little black pixels/dots but from across the room I quickly stopped noticing them. It seems like it's roughly 1080p. I'm even happy with the brightness during the daytime when light is shining around the edges of the blackout curtain over the bedroom sliding glass door. Even better, the USB port provides power to the Firestick while it's connected to the HDMI port. And the Firestick also has bluetooth which connects to my nice speakers! So, this cuts back on any extra wires or power cords. It runs quiet and after watching a two hour movie I didn't feel any heat when feeling the top of it. The only issue i had was the limited angle adjustment. It only allows adjusting the top/bottom (or up/down?). Useful for when the projecting is going to be sitting on the floor or mounted on the ceiling. But if you want the left and right sides of the projection to be even then it does need to be pointing straight ahead. If this is common with projectors then c'est la vie!

reviewTitle: THE BEST 1080P+SIZE OF SCREEN YOU CAN HAVE FOR THE DISTANCE!!!+PRICE+2YEAR WARRANTY!!!!
reviewDescription: I ORDER 1 AND AS SOON I INSTALL IT ON MY MASTER BEDROOM 11 FEET WALL TO WALL I MANAGE TO GET 120" SCREEN SO AMAZING 1080P I NEVER PUT BACK MY SMART 4K TV AND I ORDER A SECOND ONE FOR THE FAMILY ROOM.YOU NEED TO GET GRAY COLOR SCREEN PROJECTOR AND IS AMAZING IF YOU USE WHITE IT WILL BE BLURRY SO YOU NEED TO DO ALSO VERY GOOD ALIGN THE PROJECTOR TO BE IN THE CENTER OF THE SCREEN AND MAKE ADJUSTMENTS SO YOU CAN SEE CLEAR YOU WILL NEED A STAND FOR WALL OR TRIPOD TO BE ABLE HAVE THE PROJECTOR CENTER ALSO TRY TO HAVE SAY THE GUIDE WHERE ARE LETTERS AND MAKE SURE TO ADJUST THE PROJECTOR LENSES SO THE MAJORITY OF THE WORDS ARE CLEAR OR PAUSE A MOVIE TO BE ABLE TO SEE THE SUBTITLES.THIS TWO GREY COLOR SCREEN AND A STAND AND A PERFECT ALIGN AND THIS PRODUCT WILL MAKE YOU SMILE AND YOU WILL NEVER BY OTHER TV. ACTUALLY  I HAD A 55 SMART TV AND WANTED TO GET NEW 86" THE PRICE WAS 1500 NOW I HAVE A 120' AT MASTER BEDROOM AND 170" AT FAMILY ROOM! SO AMAZING BRING THE THEATER HOME. USE A SOUND BAR WITH ARC HDMI AND A XBOX OR ANY OTHER DEVICE YOU LOVE AND YOU WILL HAVE ALL THE SMART TVS APP YOU LIKE!!THANK YOUAUKING FOR A GREAT PRODUCT..

We really wanted a 3rd TV but did not want to break the bank and this exceeded our expectations! So the instructions try to make you think that you HAVE to connect this projector to your phone however you don’t need to do that. We plugged our Firestick into the USB plug on the side, we changed the source setting to HDMI (but do it from the remote youre given DONT change the setting from the projector itself or it won’t work). And then we plugged in some $10 computer speakers from Walmart: Go to Settings from the Firestick remote and click on-Sound and then Surround Sound- and then pick the option that isn’t DOBY. And of course make sure your computer speakers are plugged into the Aux port on the side. Again this is only if you have a Firestick! I’m sure you can use a ROKU stick that plugs in or an Amazon stick you’ll just have to play around with the settings to get it to work for one of those.And then we just put up a little $4 shelf from Walmart and set everything above our bed. The pictures shown that is a 10ft wide wall and the projector is 15ft away. Crystal clear quality you just have to adjust the focus on the top.We really have no negatives to this! Other than trying to figure out how we could make sure to get our Netflix and Hulu and such (which again we were able to do with the Firestick) that’s the only negative I’d say we had. Cause the original instructions immediately tell you the projector cannot stream Netflix Hulu Amazon prime but we hacked it! Definitely worth the money!

reviewTitle: Really good for the money. worth double or more.  volume is the low point
reviewDescription: I really needed a projector in a rush for an indoor presentation during daytime.  I was going to get a TV in the house later on, but after using this for a week, I think I'm going to just use the projector if I can figure out how to use a soundbar.Set up was very easy and intuitive.  I've connected my amazon stick to it, as well as my laptop, and my iphone.  (which some reviewers have said didn't work, but to me it did connect, and it mirrors all of my screen, not just certain apps).I display it in the family room, comes out to at least 90 inches, I've watched youtube videos and family photos so far.  The picture quality is surprisingly good and also bright enough that I don't have to turn off the lights to see.  If I wanted really good picture I would turn off the lights.The bad: the volume.  the included speaker is low quality, however there is an aux chord output and RCA type of output, but I haven't been able to get those to work yet.  I don't think it has bluetooth, so that is not an option.

This is a must have! You can adjust the lens, the tilt of the projections, and the quality is all there! Also explains how to clean your projector too!! I dont even have a projection white backdrop and its just fine!!

Amazing for my little dorm room. I got this 42 percent off and it was totally worth it. I would totally recommend for ppl with small rooms :) . The quality of the project is quite impressive for the price. And the sound is also pretty good in my small room. I wouldn’t depend on it for a giant room but it’s definitely great for the price and super easy for me since I have an hdmi port already in my computer. One thing to know if you want to use iPhone, you’ll need to buy the proper adaptors but it recommends in the pamphlet what to buy! Overall I’m super satisfied

reviewTitle: So much fun for our family
reviewDescription: We're big into Mario kart and studio Ghibli. I got this for our anniversary and we LOVED playing stardew and Mario outside under the stars. The picture is great and it's easy to set up/move around. I got a queen sized flat sheet to work as the back drop and tah dah!
I use my projector twice a week for 3- 4 hour sessions of D&D.  This is perfect for this.  Easy to set up and pack up.  I've even started recommending it to my friends and coworkers.

This product is great!!  It has a great picture and is good if you are looking for a cheap projector.  It is easy to use.  This product is great if you don't have a lot of space and you don't have room for a television as it works with the fire stick.  Overall, I would suggest this projector as it is of great quality and super light and small.
I love how compact and how easy it is to use

reviewTitle: Excellent Small Projector For The Price
reviewDescription: Using this projector with AtmosFX and it works really well. Good Speaker, Crystal Clear image once focused. Can't complain at all.

So far I have used this projector outside twice. I hooked my Firestick to it and we watched a couple rented movies. At 630 PM the sun  still lights up the west and the projector was plenty bright enough to easily see the movie we were watching. Be aware that if you buy the lowest priced model you only have three options for sound:1. Use the built in speaker that sounds "tinny" and doesn't get that loud2. Connect a 3.5mm aux cable and connect it to external speakers3. Connect your phone to the projector via USB to HDMI and BlueTooth your phone to an external set of speakers.  I used the AUX cable and realized that I need a more beefy set of speakers to get louder sound, which isn't a big deal for me. Until I find the right speakers I will continue using my JBL Charge 3 at full volume. This coming weekend my son and I will connect the X Box Series X and do some evening gaming and hang out near the Solo Stove if weather permits.  I can not stress enough how great this projector is. I can not comment on the longevity of the projector as I have owned it for about 4 days, but it has been great when we have used it. Auking has done a great job in making an affordable projector that is easy to set up and extremely bright. This is our family's new outside fun. It is definitely worth the money.

reviewTitle: Worked great out of the box
reviewDescription: Very easy to set up and connect to an iPhone and speaker with the right cables, which we had already.
This was will worth it love the amazing size screen so entertaining for me and kids on nice cool summer night and such a crisp clean picture love this 😀

Honestly, I am surprised at the quality of this for the price. We have used it indoors during the day with the curtains drawn no problem.We have watched movies and played video games on this. The speakers are garbage, plan on using the 3.5mm aux out to connect to speakers, but the fan isn't too loud.

The projector suits our needs. We just wanted something for our grandkids. The picture is clear and is compatible with a PC tablet using HDMI wire. No bluetooth. We tried plug ins for iPad or iPhone but was unable to use due to copyright. However, it doesn't deter our use of it.
Great projector for the price. Good customer service by company.
This product was amazing. I hooked it up with my fire-stick and had an amazing movie night. 100/10!!!!!

reviewTitle: Cumple con su función para lo económico que es
reviewDescription: Teníamos dudas por el precio pero supero cualquier espectativa
**updated review**They reached out to me and resolved the issue.Quality is good but after one month of use the hdmi kept giving me issues even after changing adapters

reviewTitle: EDIT: Picture was dim on the left side
reviewDescription: EDIT: I got a new unit free of charge , seller support was extremely quick, works great.Turned it on and it looked like this. Tried shaking the thing, make sure it was facing straight. Think the projector wasn't installed correctly. Immediately put it back in the box. Really wanted to use it this weekend.
Using it to give PowerPoint presentations.  The only problem is the remote only works for movies, must use keypad to move from one slide to the next.
Buying this project for when october comes around, been using it for movies and its crystal clear!

Update: after leaving the review, the company reached out and sent me a new cord. Great customer service!The provided power cord barely plugs into the projector. If it is bumped or anything the cord will fall out, not sure if they sent a faulty cord or projector, but I did see other reviews that mentioned this as well. Not happy that a brand new and expensive product doesn’t properly connect and feels shady.
The size is great , value for your money ,audio is great , durability , Bluetooth connectivity is great image is fantastic screen fits well
Quality is very good

reviewTitle: Muy recomendado. Se ve mejor de lo que se aprecia en el video.
reviewDescription: Me sorprendió en verdad, la calidad de imagen es increíble, la pared que tengo no alcanza el tamaño máximo del proyector, es súper grande la imagen del proyector, la calidad de audio está muy aceptable, pensé que sería peor, solo que no es mucho sonido, igual se le puede conectar una bocina aparte si quieres más sonido.Es simplemente conectar y ver.
Works fine, just sucks it doesn’t screw on to mounts from above like most

The oval product is okay. The HDMI cord that came with mine was broken from one end so I had to purchase a new one along with an hdmi adapter for my laptop. It’s an OK product kinda loud sounds like it’s overheating but that’s just the fan. Was going to use it in my small media room but not the quality I expected so I will just use it for my classroom projects.
I’m not really a snob when it comes to pixels but with the projector , any live action movies won’t show all that good. I would recommended this if your watching like cartoons or low budget animes

Wasn’t expecting much for the price but I was disappointed that the screen is slanted. I had to put something underneath the left side of the projector to balance/straighten out the picture. Also, the speaker sounds distorted when you try to raise the volume. Don’t want to go through the hassle of returning it so will just keep it. Pros: Picture does display good and set up was easy.
Too much input lag for a gamer

reviewTitle: Not a bad experience, but honestly it’s one of those hyped up things
reviewDescription: The product is okay, not bad for a room projector. Picture quality isn’t the best as you make the screen bigger and bigger. Overall sound is fantastic, picture quality is average, and setup is easy. Good for movie nights with friends and family  with proper setup mounted to wall and adjusted correctly.

I'm pretty impressed with the picture for the price, although I don't know much about electronics. But, the fan is so loud i'm concerned that its going to take off! Idk if I need to be worried it's overheating.  I'll try to update if it actually breaks.  The picture is good though,  and the sound isn't amazing, but it's definitely audible.  Even over the jet engine fan.
Slightly difficult to set up but otherwise nice
Found the picture to be less than ideal, not really bright enough nor clear enough. For the money I would say it performed okay but did not really meet expectations

reviewTitle: It’s the blurry edges for me.
reviewDescription: I like the easy functionality, but hate everything else. The edges of the screen remain blurry despite all adjustments (unless you have the screen the minimum distance required to project). It’s the bad hdmi for me. It’s the short cord for me. It’s the 520/10 vision for me. Do not buy.

reviewTitle: Doesn’t work like I thought it would
reviewDescription: I thought I was able to screen mirror my movies but it wants me to sign up for a separate thing, I tried to ignore it and try to mirror my screen but it would t let me.
